articles.title: Arsenal fans react to Gabriel Martinelli injury news - TBR - The Boot Room - Football News
articles.description: Arsenal fans are disappointed to hear the 19-year-old could miss the rest of the season.
articles.content:
It is never a dull day to be an Arsenal fan at the moment. Yesterday saw Cedric Soares and David Luiz reportedly offered new deals and a topsy-turvy day in regards to injury trouble. 
Most fans fear… [+2431 chars]

articles.title: Ishant Sharma resumes outdoor training after three months - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ishant Sharma was seen practising warm-up drills and some basic training. He captioned the post, “Engaging myself with positivity and practicing while maintaining social distancing.”
articles.content: There may be no certainty about India’s next fixture yet but India’s top cricketers are slowly but steadily getting back to training. After Test No.3 Cheteshwar Pujara, fast bowler Ishant Sharma on T… [+1419 chars]

articles.title: World Karate Federation provisionally de-recognises KAI - Economic Times

articles.author: David Mercer
articles.title: Bubba Wallace: 'Noose' found in black NASCAR driver's garage was not a crime, FBI says - Sky News
articles.description: Video evidence showed a garage door pull rope "fashioned like a noose" had been in the garage since October 2019, authorities say.

articles.author: Devendra Pandey
articles.title: Wasim Jaffer appointed Uttarakhand head coach - The Indian Express
articles.description: Wasim Jaffer, the highest run-getter in Ranji Trophy, is set to coach Uttarakhand for one season. Earlier this year, he had announced retirement after playing for over two decades.
articles.content: Wasim Jaffer has played 260 First-Class matches, scoring 19,410 runs at an average of 50.67 during his playing career. (Source: PTI Photo)Former India opener Wasim Jaffer has been appointed as head c… [+2995 chars]
